title: Drawing, "Shelving Unit", ca. 1929–30
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: 6; inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P; lower right in graphite: SCALE 1"=1'0"/7429; inscribed dimensions
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for small, low shelving unit. Overall square shape with two shelves in lighter wood, and body in darker wood. Shelves open on the right side. Unit on two low, rectangular feet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Shelving Unit", ca. 1929–30.
ca. 1929–30. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-869.
